(await box.retrieve()).toString()
await box.retrieve()
await box.store(32)
const box = Box.attach('0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3')
const Box = await ethers.getContractFactory('Box')
await box2.store(42)
const box2 = Box.attach('0xe7f1725e7734ce288f83677e1bb143e90bb3f0512')
const box = Box.attach('0xe7f1725e7734ce288f83677e1bb143e90bb3f0512')
const box = Box.attach('$ npx hardhat run --network localhost scripts/deploy.js')
const Box = await ethers.getContractFactory('Box')
